metadata.Title: CVE-2007-6758 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in feed-proxy.php in extjs 5.0.0.

notes.Note: seth-arnold> I don't believe the vulnerable file is included in the binary pacakges

criterions.comment: htmlunit: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
icinga-web: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
libjs-extjs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
